short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Can't decide whether you want to buy a thing? Get an instant yes/no decision!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're shopping online and feeling indecisive about a purchase, this extension will give you some guidance to help your decision - simply click on the extension icon and you'll be presented with a yes or no response to the question 'Should I Buy This?' - complete with a hilarious GIF! (Note: this extension is just for fun - answers are generated randomly!)
